REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1240 reute r f BC-ALCOA-<AA>-TO-SELL-AM 03-19 0055

TEXT.TITLE: ALCOA <AA> TO SELL AMERICAN POWDERED METALS
TEXT.BODY: Aluminum Co of America said it has signed a letter of intent to sell its American Powdered Metals Co subsidiary to R.W. Technology Inc for undisclosed terms, with completion expected in early May. American Powdered makes metal parts for various industries. Reuter
